name: Pirate power
description:
These cute, brightly coloured skull and crossbone stickers will fit perfectly into every child's bedroom. Boys love them anyway, but our little girl insisted on a pink one with flowers for her room.

Order one sticker in your favourite colour or order more in different colours. Simply select from the options below. Please send us an email to pirates@lotteloves.com and let us know if you prefer stars or flowers - or let us choose.

Made from ultra-thin, self-adhesive, matte vinyl film our wall tattoos will appear as if drawn onto your walls. Sizes for each individual sticker approx 21x21cm.

Our wall decals are fun and easy to install. A simple step-by-step instruction is included.

All our wall transfers are easily removable without a trace.
Please choose a colour from the colour chart.

name: Creepy creatures
description:
These unusual, brightly coloured creatures are guaranteed to brighten up any room in your house. Choose one or more individual wall stickers or buy a pack of all 5 designs at a discount.

Made from ultra-thin, self-adhesive, matte vinyl film our wall tattoos will appear as if drawn onto your walls. Sizes for each individual sticker ranging from 33cm wide x 13cm high to 26cm wide x 20cm high (approx. A4 size). Please select your choice from the dropdown menu below.

All our wall transfers are easily removable without a trace.

name: Forest friends
description:
These happy forest animal are guaranteed to brighten up the walls of your nursery. The forest friends only come as a set of 5, because we couldn't bare to split them up.

Made from ultra-thin, self-adhesive, matte vinyl film our wall tattoos will appear as if drawn onto your walls. Sizes for each individual sticker ranging from 45cm wide x 17cm high to 11cm wide x 7cm high. Colours may differ slightly.

All our wall transfers are easily removable without a trace.

name: Dastardly dinosaurs
description:
These friendly, brightly coloured dinosaur wall stickers are guaranteed to brighten up the walls of your nursery. Choose one or more individual dinosaur stickers or buy a pack of all 5 designs at a discount.

Made from ultra-thin, self-adhesive, matte vinyl film our wall tattoos will appear as if drawn onto your walls. Sizes for each individual sticker ranging from 33cm wide x 18cm high to 21cm wide x 30cm high (approx. A4 size). Please select your choice from the dropdown menu below.

All our wall transfers are easily removable without a trace.

name: Cute cars (A5)
description:
Set of 5 different vehicle wall stickers. 
These fun, brightly coloured cars are guaranteed to make your little boy happy. Friends have asked me for months to design some car decals and here they are.
These are available in two different sizes, please select from the dropdown below.

Made from ultra-thin, self-adhesive, matte vinyl film our wall tattoos will appear as if drawn onto your walls. Sizes for each individual sticker approx A5 (a bit smaller than our other stickers), but are also available in A4. Please select below.

Our wall decals are fun and easy to install. A simple step-by-step instruction is included.

All our wall transfers are easily removable without a trace.

For any special requests regarding colour or size please email sigi@lotteloves.com.
